schools.name: Peking University
schools.address: No. 5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District, Beijing 100871
schools.description: Peking University is one of China's most prestigious universities, known as the 'MIT of China'. Founded in 1898 as the Imperial University of Peking.

schools.name: Zhejiang University
schools.address: No. 866 Yuanda Road, Xihu District, Hangzhou 310058
schools.description: Zhejiang University is one of China's oldest and most prestigious universities, known for its comprehensive academic programs. Founded in 1897.

schools.name: National University of Singapore
schools.address: 21 Lower Kent Ridge Road, Singapore 119077
schools.description: NUS is Singapore's oldest and leading university, consistently ranked among the top universities in Asia and globally. Founded in 1905.

schools.name: Yonsei University
schools.address: 50 Yonsei-ro, Seodaemun-gu, Seoul 03722
schools.description: Yonsei University is one of South Korea's oldest and most prestigious universities, known as the 'Ivy League of Korea'. Founded in 1885.

schools.name: Seoul National University
schools.address: 1 Gwanak-ro, Gwanak-gu, Seoul 08826
schools.description: SNU is South Korea's leading national university, consistently ranked as the top university in Korea. Founded in 1946.
schools.motto: Veritas Lux Mea (Truth is My Light)

schools.name: University of Tokyo
schools.address: 7-3-1 Hongo, Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo 113-8654
schools.description: The University of Tokyo is Japan's most prestigious university, known for research excellence and producing Nobel laureates. Founded in 1877.

schools.name: Osaka University
schools.address: 1-1 Yamadaoka, Suita, Osaka 565-0871
schools.description: Osaka University is one of Japan's leading national universities, known for research in science and engineering. Founded in 1931.

schools.name: National Taiwan University
schools.address: No. 1, Sec. 4, Roosevelt Road, Taipei 10617
schools.description: NTU is Taiwan's most prestigious university, known for academic excellence and comprehensive programs. Founded in 1928.

schools.name: Tsinghua University High School
schools.address: No. 1 Wenhua East Road, Haidian District, Beijing 100084
schools.description: Tsinghua High School is one of China's most prestigious high schools, affiliated with Tsinghua University. Founded in 1915.

schools.address: 160 Tai Kwai Wan Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
schools.description: St. Francis Canossian College is a prestigious Catholic girls' secondary school in Hong Kong, known for academic excellence. Founded in 1860.

schools.description: Heep Yunn School is a leading girls' school in Hong Kong, known for bilingual education and holistic development. Founded in 1936.

schools.address: 18 La Salle Road, Kowloon City, Hong Kong
schools.description: La Salle College is a prestigious Catholic boys' secondary school in Hong Kong, known for academic and sports excellence. Founded in 1932.

schools.address: 70 Cloud View Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
schools.description: Pui Ching Middle School is a renowned Chinese-medium secondary school in Hong Kong, known for moral education. Founded in 1936.

schools.name: Diocesan Boys' School
schools.address: 131 Mong Kok Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong
schools.description: Diocesan Boys' School is one of Hong Kong's most prestigious boys' schools, known for academics, music, and sports. Founded in 1869.

schools.name: St. Mary's Canossian College
schools.address: 2 Stanley Village Road, Stanley, Hong Kong
schools.description: St. Mary's Canossian College is a Catholic girls' secondary school in Hong Kong, emphasizing character development. Founded in 1860.

schools.address: 51 Hing Man Road, Shau Kei Wan, Hong Kong
schools.description: Buddhist Wing Yan School is a Buddhist-involved EMI secondary school in Hong Kong, known for holistic education. Founded in 1982.

schools.description: Kowloon Methodist Primary School is a well-established primary school in Hong Kong, providing quality education since 1973.

schools.address: 190 Dunearn Road, Singapore 309437
